scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:prod &&  aws s3 sync ./dist/redwhale-renew s3://redwhale.xyz --acl public-read --delete --profile redwhale-web && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EIK58AU9N4DDK --paths "/*" --profile redwhale-web
scripts.deploy:v3: npm run build:dev &&  aws s3 sync ./dist/rw-ng-renewal s3://v3.redwhale.xyz --acl public-read --delete --profile redwhale-web && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3UZETVJ2A8VE5 --paths "/*" --profile redwhale-web
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev &&  aws s3 sync ./dist/rw-ng-renewal s3://dev.redwhale.xyz --acl public-read --delete --profile redwhale-web && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1D9YAR73EHKWE --paths "/*" --profile redwhale-web
scripts.deploy-exsiting:dev: aws s3 sync ./dist/rw-ng-renewal s3://dev.redwhale.xyz --acl public-read --delete --profile redwhale-web && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1D9YAR73EHKWE --paths "/*" --profile redwhale-web
scripts.watch: ng build --watch --configuration development && aws s3 sync ./dist/rw-ng-renewal s3://redwhale.xyz --acl public-read --delete --profile redwhale-web && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EIK58AU9N4DDK --paths '/*' --profile redwhale-web
